description.raw:
There are currently some problems with the compilation of gazebo9 since vcpkg protobuf and qt libraries are getting somehow into the compilation mix [resulting in a conflict](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/113/consoleFull#5493443676ea37b8d-a6d4-40ae-8431-d90c018842af) with the tarballs used there.

Before spending more time investigating how them are getting into the mix \(even if the integration of vcpkg is disabled\) let’s remove the vcpkg packages to get the things back to work:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64&build=116)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/116/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/116/))
description.html:
There are currently some problems with the compilation of gazebo9 since vcpkg protobuf and qt libraries are getting somehow into the compilation mix resulting in a conflict with the tarballs used there.

Before spending more time investigating how them are getting into the mix (even if the integration of vcpkg is disabled) let’s remove the vcpkg packages to get the things back to work:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/116/)

title.raw: Uninstall vcpkg protobuf and qt before compile gazebo classic

Before spending more time investigating how them are getting into the mix (even if the integration of vcpkg is disabled) let’s remove the vcpkg packages to get the things back to work:
